snippet: WPIX, which broadcast Yankees games from 1951 to 1998, will show 20 games a year under a multiyear deal.
abstract: WPIX-TV strikes multiyear deal to carry about 20 New York Yankees games annually, bringing team back to longtime broadcast home in the New York area.
lead_paragraph: WPIX, which broadcast Yankees games from 1951 to 1998, will show 20 games a year under a multiyear deal.

headline.main: Yankees to Return to WPIX-TV, 20 Times a Year
headline.print_headline: Yankees to Return to a Former TV Home, 20 Times a Year
